name: A Heike Tale (Browser Demo)
description:
Concept demo of an RPGMakerMV title based on the medieval Japanese epic Tale of the Heike. Introduction + First Dungeon.

DLC: MV Trinity Resource Pack + Samurai Classics 1

Referenced Works:

  • Tale of the Heike - Royall Tyler translation
  • Heike Story by Naoko Yamada
  • Tale of Genji - Washburn (Kiritsubo Chapter)
